France: one of the countries with the highest alcohol consumption.

More than 1 in 5 French people drink at risk, with a clear male predominance.

Few patients with alcohol misuse access specialist care.

Second cause of avoidable (premature) death after tobacco.

question.title: What is a notable statistic about alcohol consumption in France?
question.description: According to the BEH 2019 report, what percentage of French people drink at risk?

option_a.title: More than 1 in 10 French people drink at risk
option_a.description: A plausible but incorrect estimate that is close to the actual figure

option_b.title: More than 1 in 5 French people drink at risk
option_b.description: The correct answer based on the BEH 2019 report

option_c.title: Only 1 in 10 French people drink at risk
option_c.description: An incorrect but not implausible estimate that might be based on a different source

option_d.title: All French people drink at risk
option_d.description: An extreme and incorrect statement that is not supported by any evidence

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct option
